${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:HeatSinkBlockMod.NAME: Heat Sink Block
${modID}:HeatSinkBlockMod.DESCRIPTION: You don't lose this block at the end of turns. This block gets used last.

${modID}:ThrowingHammer.NAME: Throwing Hammer
${modID}:ThrowingHammer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 2 ${modID}:Cure. NL Apply 1 ${modID}:Scorch. NL Put this card on top of your draw pile.
${modID}:ThrowingHammer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 2 ${modID}:Cure. NL Gain 1 Strength. NL Apply 1 ${modID}:Scorch. NL Return this to hand.

${modID}:SmokeScreen.NAME: Smoke Screen
${modID}:SmokeScreen.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and reduce the cost of the next card you play by 1.

${modID}:ThermiteGrenade.NAME: Thermite Grenade
${modID}:ThermiteGrenade.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply !M! ${modID}:Scorch to ALL enemies.

${modID}:AshesToAshes.NAME: Ashes to Ashes
${modID}:AshesToAshes.DESCRIPTION: When you play a card containing "Grenade", return it to your hand.
${modID}:AshesToAshes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL When you play a card containing "Grenade", return it to your hand.

${modID}:SolarRampart.NAME: Solar Rampart
${modID}:SolarRampart.DESCRIPTION: If the last card played this combat was a skill, gain !B! Block and !M! ${modID}:Cure.

${modID}:FierySplendor.NAME: Fiery Splendor
${modID}:FierySplendor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Double your ${modID}:Cure. NL Double ALL ${modID}:Scorch. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BringTheHeat.NAME: Bring the Heat
${modID}:BringTheHeat.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your ${modID}:Cure to ALL enemies.
${modID}:BringTheHeat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to double your ${modID}:Cure to ALL enemies.

${modID}:BurningFists.NAME: Burning Fists
${modID}:BurningFists.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply ${modID}:Scorch equal to your ${modID}:Cure.
${modID}:BurningFists.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply ${modID}:Scorch equal to your ${modID}:Cure.

${modID}:PercussiveFlames.NAME: Percussive Flames
${modID}:PercussiveFlames.DESCRIPTION: When you apply ${modID}:Scorch, apply 1 more. NL Add !M! Burns to your hand.
${modID}:PercussiveFlames.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you apply ${modID}:Scorch, apply 1 more. NL Add !M! Burn to your hand.

${modID}:Consecrate.NAME: Consecrate
${modID}:Consecrate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies twice. Heal HP equal to unblocked damage.

${modID}:ForgeMaster.NAME: Forge Master
${modID}:ForgeMaster.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Ignitions you cause apply !M! ${modID}:Scorch and deal 30 damage to other enemies instead of 15.

${modID}:SunfireFurnace.NAME: Sunfire Furnace
${modID}:SunfireFurnace.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Cure. You cannot lose ${modID}:Cure until your next turn.

${modID}:PhoenixRising.NAME: Phoenix Rising
${modID}:PhoenixRising.DESCRIPTION: Gain !CURE! ${modID}:Cure. NL Permanently increase this card's ${modID}:Cure by !M!. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BurningTreads.NAME: Burning Treads
${modID}:BurningTreads.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Scorch. NL Whenever you play a card this turn, the enemy gains 1 ${modID}:Scorch.

${modID}:Firewalker.NAME: Firewalker
${modID}:Firewalker.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Scorch to ALL enemies. NL Gain 1 Artifact.

${modID}:Frostburn.NAME: Frostburn
${modID}:Frostburn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Scorch. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Slow. NL Gain ${modID}:Frost_Armor. NL ${modID}:Willable.

${modID}:RememberedVow.NAME: Remembered Vow
${modID}:RememberedVow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Randomly increase one of these by !M! permanently. NL Costs 1 less if *Broken *Oath is not in your deck.
${modID}:RememberedVow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Increase both of these by !M! permanently. NL Costs 1 less if *Broken *Oath is not in your deck.

${modID}:BrokenOath.NAME: Broken Oath
${modID}:BrokenOath.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Costs 1 less if *Remembered *Vow is not in your deck.

${modID}:HungeringFlame.NAME: Hungering Flame
${modID}:HungeringFlame.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Equalize your ${modID}:Hunger and ${modID}:Cure. NL End your turn.

${modID}:Gnaw.NAME: Gnaw
${modID}:Gnaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each [E] you have.

${modID}:StarvingGrenade.NAME: Starving Grenade
${modID}:StarvingGrenade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Hunger !M!. NL Take 3 damage for each [E] you have.

${modID}:VoidwallGrenade.NAME: Voidwall Grenade
${modID}:VoidwallGrenade.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy hits your Block, apply !M! ${modID}:Suppress to them.

${modID}:SuppressionGrenade.NAME: Suppression Grenade
${modID}:SuppressionGrenade.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 ${modID}:Suppress for each [E] you have. NL Play this twice.

${modID}:PurgingMaw.NAME: Purging Maw
${modID}:PurgingMaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies and yourself. NL ${modID}:Hunger !M! for each hit.

${modID}:OrbitalShield.NAME: Orbital Shield
${modID}:OrbitalShield.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! to a random enemy 3 times. NL Gain Block equal to unblocked damage.

${modID}:DreadedVisage.NAME: Dreaded Visage
${modID}:DreadedVisage.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Suppress to ALL enemies for each Void card in your draw pile. NL Exhaust ALL Voids in your draw pile.

${modID}:UnwaveringStarBase.NAME: Unwavering Star
${modID}:UnwaveringStarBase.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Does nothing until you've chosen a path.
${modID}:UnwaveringStarBase.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Does nothing until you've chosen a path. NL (Remove either *Remembered *Vow or *Broken *Oath)

${modID}:UnwaveringStarVow.NAME: Unwavering Star
${modID}:UnwaveringStarVow.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Hunger !M!. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Randomly increase one of these by 1 permanently.
${modID}:UnwaveringStarVow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Hunger !M!. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Increase both of these by 1 permanently.

${modID}:Vengeance.NAME: Vengeance
${modID}:Vengeance.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you take health damage, apply !M! ${modID}:Suppress to that enemy. NL When it dies, ${modID}:Hunger equal to its max health.

${modID}:DesolateWill.NAME: Desolate Will
${modID}:DesolateWill.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw an Unplayable card, draw 1 card.
${modID}:DesolateWill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you draw an Unplayable card, draw 1 card.

${modID}:DoomFall.NAME: Doom Fall
${modID}:DoomFall.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Void card in your draw pile. NL Exhaust ALL Voids in your draw pile.

${modID}:EmptyEmbrace.NAME: Empty Embrace
${modID}:EmptyEmbrace.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Void cards lose Ethereal. NL Deal !M! damage to ALL enemies when you draw a Void card.

${modID}:DarkGift.NAME: Dark Gift
${modID}:DarkGift.DESCRIPTION: Gain a random common relic. NL Lose 3 Max HP. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:DarkGift.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain a random relic. NL Lose 3 Max HP. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Satiation.NAME: Satiation
${modID}:Satiation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each Void in your draw pile. NL Exhaust ALL Voids in your draw pile. NL Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.
${modID}:Satiation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Hunger 2. NL Gain !B! Block for each Void in your draw pile. NL Exhaust ALL Voids in your draw pile. NL Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.

${modID}:Starvation.NAME: Starvation
${modID}:Starvation.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Hunger 1 at the start of your turn. Increase this amount by !M! every turn. NL Deal damage equal to unspend energy to random enemies at the end of your turn.

${modID}:ColdDarkGentle.NAME: Cold, Dark, Gentle
${modID}:ColdDarkGentle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Hunger 10. NL Reduce the cost of this card to 0 if an enemy is frozen.

${modID}:AbyssalFlare.NAME: Abyssal Flare
${modID}:AbyssalFlare.DESCRIPTION: Convert your ${modID}:Cure into Block and ${modID}:Hunger equal to the converted amount.
${modID}:AbyssalFlare.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Convert your ${modID}:Cure into Block and ${modID}:Hunger equal to the converted amount. NL Ignite a random enemy.

${modID}:LeechingGrab.NAME: Leeching Grab
${modID}:LeechingGrab.DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL debuffs from an enemy. NL Deal !D! damage and gain !B! Block for each stack removed.

${modID}:DirePredicament.NAME: Dire Predicament
${modID}:DirePredicament.DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL your debuffs. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust ALL cards in your hand and discard pile.
${modID}:DirePredicament.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL your debuffs. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust ALL cards in your discard pile.

${modID}:KnowledgeShock.NAME: Knowledge Shock
${modID}:KnowledgeShock.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a *Void card, gain !M! ${modID}:Amp and draw !M! card.
${modID}:KnowledgeShock.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a *Void card, gain !M! ${modID}:Amp and draw !M! cards.

${modID}:PulseGrenade.NAME: Pulse Grenade
${modID}:PulseGrenade.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply !M! ${modID}:Jolt to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Overload.NAME: Overload
${modID}:Overload.DESCRIPTION: Double an enemy's ${modID}:Jolt. NL Deal !D! damage.

${modID}:SeismicStrike.NAME: Seismic Strike
${modID}:SeismicStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal 2*X damage. NL Apply 2*X ${modID}:Jolt. NL Gain 2*X ${modID}:Amp. NL Refund 1 [E].
${modID}:SeismicStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal 2*X damage. NL Apply 2*X ${modID}:Jolt. NL Gain 2*X ${modID}:Amp. NL Draw X cards. NL Refund 1 [E].

${modID}:SturdyCircuitry.NAME: Sturdy Circuitry
${modID}:SturdyCircuitry.DESCRIPTION: Refund 1 [E] when you play a card that costs more than !M!. NL ${modID}:Willable.

${modID}:Poke.NAME: Poke
${modID}:Poke.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to stacks of ${modID}:Jolt on the enemy. NL Draw !M! card.
${modID}:Poke.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to stacks of ${modID}:Jolt on the enemy. NL Draw !M! cards.

${modID}:SearingVoltage.NAME: Searing Voltage
${modID}:SearingVoltage.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy gains ${modID}:Scorch, they also gain 3 ${modID}:Jolt.
${modID}:SearingVoltage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy gains ${modID}:Scorch, they also gain 3 ${modID}:Jolt. NL Whenever an enemy ${modID}:Ignites, gain 10 ${modID}:Amp.

${modID}:Battery.NAME: Battery
${modID}:Battery.DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL your ${modID}:Amp and regain it at the start of your next turn.
${modID}:Battery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL your ${modID}:Amp and regain twice the amount you had at the start of your next turn.

${modID}:NegativeFeedback.NAME: Negative Feedback
${modID}:NegativeFeedback.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you take health damage while ${modID}:Amped, apply !M! ${modID}:Jolt to ALL enemies.
${modID}:NegativeFeedback.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you take health damage while ${modID}:Amped, apply !M! ${modID}:Jolt to ALL enemies.

${modID}:PositiveFeedback.NAME: Positive Feedback
${modID}:PositiveFeedback.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if you didn't take health damage since last turn, gain !M! ${modID}:Amp.
${modID}:PositiveFeedback.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, if you didn't take health damage since last turn, gain !M! ${modID}:Amp.

${modID}:ConsumingEnergy.NAME: Consuming Energy
${modID}:ConsumingEnergy.DESCRIPTION: The next time more than 3 [E] is spend at once this turn, Refund 3 [E].

${modID}:Recrudesce.NAME: Recrudesce
${modID}:Recrudesce.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy ${modID}:Ignites, apply 4 ${modID}:Scorch and 5 ${modID}:Jolt to a random enemy.
${modID}:Recrudesce.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy ${modID}:Ignites, apply 4 ${modID}:Scorch and 5 ${modID}:Jolt to ALL enemies.

${modID}:FinalStand.NAME: Final Stand
${modID}:FinalStand.DESCRIPTION: Draw cards until your hand is full. NL Gain 3 [E]. NL Gain 3 ${modID}:Will. NL Can't play above 25% health.
${modID}:FinalStand.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard any number of cards. NL Draw cards until your hand is full. NL Gain 3 [E]. NL Gain 3 ${modID}:Will. NL Can't play above 25% health.

${modID}:Impede.NAME: Impede
${modID}:Impede.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each card played this turn.

${modID}:Alternate.NAME: Alternate
${modID}:Alternate.DESCRIPTION: Discard 1 card. NL Deal !D! damage to random enemies a number of times equal to [E] of the discarded card.
${modID}:Alternate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard 1 card. NL Draw cards and deal !D! damage to random enemies a number of times equal to [E] of the discarded card.

${modID}:OffAndOnAgain.NAME: Off and On Again
${modID}:OffAndOnAgain.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards then discard !M! cards. NL Return this to your hand.
${modID}:OffAndOnAgain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards then discard !M! cards. NL Gain !M! temporary Strength. NL Return this to your hand.

${modID}:GlacierGrenade.NAME: Glacier Grenade
${modID}:GlacierGrenade.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block, then if you have !M! or more Block, apply 3 ${modID}:Slow to ALL enemies.

${modID}:GlacialGuard.NAME: Glacial Guard
${modID}:GlacialGuard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL When an enemy hits your block this turn, apply !M! ${modID}:Slow to them.
${modID}:GlacialGuard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL When an enemy hits your block this turn, apply !M! ${modID}:Slow to them. NL If you lose all block, apply 5 ${modID}:Slow to ALL enemies.

${modID}:OutOfOptions.NAME: Out Of Options
${modID}:OutOfOptions.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Freeze ALL enemies and end the turn. NL Can only be played as the first card this turn. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:OutOfOptions.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL ${modID}:Freeze ALL enemies and end the turn. NL Can only be played as the first card this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:HowlingRevenge.NAME: Howling Revenge
${modID}:HowlingRevenge.DESCRIPTION: If you would die, return with !M!% health. NL Remove this card from your deck when the effect is used.

${modID}:BlissfulIgnorance.NAME: Blissful Ignorance
${modID}:BlissfulIgnorance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Will. NL Gain !B! Block next turn. You cannot see enemy intents next turn.

${modID}:ColdStare.NAME: Cold Stare
${modID}:ColdStare.DESCRIPTION: Apply 2 ${modID}:Slow to a random enemy. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Will.

${modID}:ArcticBlast.NAME: Arctic Blast
${modID}:ArcticBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Slow to ALL enemies. NL ${modID}:Willable.

${modID}:HonorTheFallen.NAME: Honor The Fallen
${modID}:HonorTheFallen.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Increase this by 2 permanently when an enemy dies.
${modID}:HonorTheFallen.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Increase this by 2 permanently when an enemy dies.

${modID}:FrigidFortification.NAME: Frigid Fortification
${modID}:FrigidFortification.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Slow to ALL enemies. NL Gain ${modID}:Frost_Armor this and next turn. NL ${modID}:Willable.

${modID}:CantDieAgain.NAME: Can't Die Again
${modID}:CantDieAgain.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Will. NL Gain Block equal to half your missing health. NL Costs 0 if under 50% HP. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:CantDieAgain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Will. NL Gain Block equal to your missing health. NL Costs 0 if under 50% HP. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:HoarfrostStomp.NAME: Hoarfrost Stomp
${modID}:HoarfrostStomp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Slow. NL Return this card to your hand. NL ${modID}:Willable.

${modID}:ShiverStrike.NAME: Shiver Strike
${modID}:ShiverStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply ALL debuffs from this enemy to ALL other enemies.

${modID}:HotAndCold.NAME: Hot and Cold
${modID}:HotAndCold.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Double the stacks of ${modID}:Scorch and ${modID}:Slow on ALL enemies. NL Gain ${modID}:Will equal to the number of enemies ${modID}:Ignited or ${modID}:Frozen this way. NL Exhaust. NL ${modID}:Willable.
${modID}:HotAndCold.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Double the stacks of ${modID}:Scorch and ${modID}:Slow on ALL enemies. NL Gain ${modID}:Will equal to the number of enemies ${modID}:Ignited or ${modID}:Frozen this way. NL ${modID}:Willable.

${modID}:EmptyAndUnmoving.NAME: Empty and Unmoving
${modID}:EmptyAndUnmoving.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you gain ${modID}:Hunger, gain ${modID}:Frost_Armor. NL ${modID}:Willable.

${modID}:QuickAndRelentless.NAME: Quick and Relentless
${modID}:QuickAndRelentless.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy is damaged by ${modID}:Jolt this turn, apply that much ${modID}:Slow.
${modID}:QuickAndRelentless.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy is damaged by ${modID}:Jolt this turn, apply that much ${modID}:Slow and gain that much ${modID}:Amp.

${modID}:RimeOrReason.NAME: Rime or Reason
${modID}:RimeOrReason.DESCRIPTION: Choose whether to gain a random card that inflicts ${modID}:Slow or a random colorless card to add to your hand. NL It costs 0 until played. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:RimeOrReason.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose whether to gain a random card that inflicts ${modID}:Slow or a random colorless card to add to your hand. NL It costs 0 this combat. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ColdShoulder.NAME: Cold Shoulder
${modID}:ColdShoulder.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible this and next turn if an enemy is ${modID}:Frozen.
${modID}:ColdShoulder.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain 1 Intangible this and next turn if an enemy is ${modID}:Frozen.

${modID}:Indecisive.NAME: Indecisive
${modID}:Indecisive.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Does nothing until you've chosen a path.
${modID}:Indecisive.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Does nothing until you've chosen a path. NL (Remove either *Remembered *Vow or *Broken *Oath)

${modID}:StandFirm.NAME: Stand Firm
${modID}:StandFirm.DESCRIPTION: Gain ${modID}:Frost_Armor and scale all your permanent scaling effects by 1.
${modID}:StandFirm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain ${modID}:Frost_Armor and scale all your permanent scaling effects by 1.

${modID}:ChillingPast.NAME: Chilling Past
${modID}:ChillingPast.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a debuff is applied to an enemy, gain 1 temporary Strength.
${modID}:ChillingPast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever a debuff is applied to an enemy, gain 1 temporary Strength.

${modID}:NewPath.NAME: New Path
${modID}:NewPath.DESCRIPTION: Remove this and 3 other cards from your deck. NL Choose a common, uncommon, and rare card to add to your deck. NL End the turn.
${modID}:NewPath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove this and 3 other cards from your deck. NL Choose a common, uncommon, and rare card to add to your deck. NL ${modID}:Freeze ALL enemies. NL End the turn.

${modID}:Payday.NAME: Payday
${modID}:Payday.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy, gain !M! gold. NL Costs 15 gold to play.

${modID}:SplitElectron.NAME: Split Electron
${modID}:SplitElectron.DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL ${modID}:Jolt from an enemy and gain that much Block.

${modID}:Disorient.NAME: Disorient
${modID}:Disorient.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak. NL Gain !M! Artifact.

${modID}:HeatSink.NAME: Heat Sink
${modID}:HeatSink.DESCRIPTION: Convert double your ${modID}:Cure into Block. You don't lose this Block as turns end.

${modID}:Broadside.NAME: Broadside
${modID}:Broadside.DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL your Block and deal !D! damage to a random combatant (including yourself) for each block removed.
${modID}:Broadside.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove half your Block and deal !D! damage to a random combatant (including yourself) for twice the block removed.

${modID}:RemoteShield.NAME: Remote Shield
${modID}:RemoteShield.DESCRIPTION: Retain. Gain !B! Block. When you Retain this card, reduce it's cost by !M! this combat.
